subtitle.superAdmin: Manage all company users and assign roles
subtitle.default: Manage all company users and assign roles to control access

users.title: Users ({{count}})
users.emptyDesc: Create your first user to get started.

roles.systemInfo: System Roles: Built-in roles that define base permissions (Super Admin, Admin, Manager, Driver, Viewer)
roles.customInfo: Custom Roles: Additional roles created in Role Management for specialized permissions (e.g., FLEET_MANAGER)
roles.baseSystemRoleHint: Select base system role (required for system access)
roles.noCustomHint: Create custom roles in the Role Management page first, then refresh this page.
roles.customInstruction: Custom roles provide additional permissions beyond the base system role. Create custom roles on the Role Management page.

confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this user? This action cannot be undone and will remove all associated data.

errors.selectCompany: Please select a company for the admin
